sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.BZT_YR AS BZT_YR ,T1.BZT_SNO AS BZT_SNO ,T1.TEAM_SNO AS TEAM_SNO ,T1.BGRP_TG_ORG_SNO AS BGRP_TG_ORG_SNO ,F_ORG_INFO(T1.ORG_CD,'1') || '(' || T1.ORG_CD || ')' AS ORG_INFO ,F_CODE_NM('1000001',T1.RGN_CD) || '(' || T1.RGN_CD || ')' AS RGN_INFO ,T1.AUD_STR_DT AS AUD_STR_DT ,T1.AUD_END_DT AS AUD_END_DT ,PSON.AUD_DAYS AS AUD_DAYS /* 일수 */ ,PSON.PSON_CNT AS PSON_CNT /* 인원수 */ ,PSON.MAN_DAY AS MAN_DAY /* 연인원 */ FROM TBBADDED008L T1, (SELECT BZT_YR ,BZT_SNO ,TEAM_SNO ,BGRP_TG_ORG_SNO ,MAX(AUD_DCN) AS AUD_DAYS ,COUNT(*) AS PSON_CNT ,SUM(AUD_DCN) AS MAN_DAY FROM TBBADDED006L WHERE BZT_YR = #strBztYr# AND BZT_SNO = #strBztSno# GROUP BY BZT_YR ,BZT_SNO ,TEAM_SNO ,BGRP_TG_ORG_SNO) PSON WHERE T1.BZT_YR = #strBztYr# AND T1.BZT_SNO = #strBztSno# AND PSON.BZT_YR = T1.BZT_YR AND PSON.BZT_SNO = T1.BZT_SNO AND PSON.TEAM_SNO = T1.TEAM_SNO AND PSON.BGRP_TG_ORG_SNO = T1.BGRP_TG_ORG_SNO ORDER BY T1.TEAM_SNO ,T1.BGRP_TG_ORG_SNO
